question.text: You arrive at an incident. There has been an engine fire and someone’s hands and arms have been burnt. You should NOT

explanation.text: This could cause further damage and infection to the wound. Your first priority is to cool the burn with a clean, cool, non-toxic liquid, preferably water. Don’t forget the casualty may be in shock.

answer.text: douse the burn thoroughly with clean cool non-toxic liquid
lay the casualty down on the ground
remove anything sticking to the burn
